title: Functionality
text: The Order Ready board is designed for customer-facing displays It shows the current status of an order and is designed to work in conjunction with the OSD Order Status Display. The ORB displays 2 columns: In Progress - This is an order that is currently being processed, once it is "bumped" to that status in the OSD Ready - This is an order which is ready to collect, once it has been "bumped" to that status in the OSD, If this application does not fit the screen correctly you can use the browser magnification to zoom in and out until it fits.
description:
The Order Ready board is designed for customer-facing displays It shows the current status of an order and is designed to work in conjunction with the OSD Order Status Display.


The ORB displays 2 columns:

In Progress - This is an order that is currently being processed, once it is "bumped" to that status in the OSD

Ready - This is an order which is ready to collect, once it has been "bumped" to that status in the OSD,



If this application does not fit the screen correctly you can use the browser magnification to zoom in and out until it fits.
